Name: Doom Rails
About the game: Doom Rails is a new casual-style 3D multiplayer cart battle game where you select one of nine characters, and zip around hazardous roller coaster tracks. Blast opponentâ€™s carts to bits using rockets, force fields, pulse waves, and mines. While battling others avoid spiked pendulums, metal fists, and exploding debris. In single player mode Mad Doc Jr. challenges you to complete five hazardous levels. If you enjoy fun battle-driving games such as Twisted Metal, Carmageddon, and Wipeout, you may enjoy playing Doom Rails! 3rd Person Mode (with multiple camera POV) Unique Fast-paced Arena Combat Style Gameplay Multiplayer action on WAN / LAN for 1-8 players Challenging AI 5 Multiplayer Levels 9 Customized Carts 6 Unique Powerups 1 Tutorial Mission 4 Singleplayer Training Missions Supports Keyboard-Mouse and USB Controllers
